title: Record Level
description: An intentionally grouped set of objects with one or more common characteristics.

collectionDescriptionPID.description: An unambiguous reference to the collection description record.

derivedCollection.description: A flag to indicate that the collection description has been generated by aggregating data from one or more underlying datasets of its individual objects.

license.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the collection description record.

recordRights.description: A statement of any rights held in/over the collection description record.

rightsHolder.description: A person or organization owning or managing rights held in/over the collection description record.

objectGroup.description: One or more Object Groups described by the Record Level

reference.description: One or more References relating to the Record Level

identifier.description: One or more Identifiers relating to the Record Level

resourceRelationship.description: One or more Resource Relationships relating to the Record Level

personRole.description: One or more Person Roles relating to the Record Level
